title: Free the artist
tags: how to unlock free the artist
content:
the Zhentarim Hideout, descend the platform where you spoke to Zarys and converse with a painter named Brem. He offers to create a portrait of you using his pet artist, for a fee. You can respond with:

A 'pet artist'? I do present well. I'll take one. No, thanks - just interested in trading. Leave.
